title: health api service liveness and db connectivity check
description: Test the /health GET endpoint to verify that the service returns 200 when healthy and 503 when the database connectivity is down.

title: studies api create study with uniqueness and websocket broadcast
description: Test POST /api/v1/studies to create a new study ensuring duplicate labels are rejected with 400, and successful creation returns 201 and triggers a WebSocket broadcast.

title: database releases api deletion protection with reporting efforts
description: Test DELETE /api/v1/database-releases/{database_release_id} to ensure deletion is blocked with 400 if dependent reporting efforts exist, otherwise deletion succeeds with 200.

title: reporting efforts api create and link to study and release
description: Test POST /api/v1/reporting-efforts to create a reporting effort linked to a valid study and database release, rejecting foreign key mismatches with 400 and missing references with 404.

title: text elements api duplicate prevention case insensitive
description: Test POST and PUT /api/v1/text-elements endpoints to ensure duplicate text elements are prevented case- and space-insensitively, returning 400 on duplicates.

title: packages api create package with unique name and deletion protection
description: Test POST /api/v1/packages to create packages with unique names rejecting duplicates with 400, and DELETE /api/v1/packages/{package_id} to block deletion if dependent items exist.

title: packages api create polymorphic package item with composite key uniqueness
description: Test POST /api/v1/packages/{package_id}/items to create polymorphic package items ensuring composite key uniqueness and proper references, rejecting duplicates or missing refs with 400 or 404.

title: websocket endpoint real time updates and initial snapshot
description: Test WebSocket connection to /api/v1/ws/studies to verify initial snapshot is sent and CRUD operations on studies trigger real-time JSON broadcasts.

title: studies api deletion blocked if releases exist
description: Test DELETE /api/v1/studies/{study_id} to ensure deletion is blocked with 400 if dependent database releases exist, otherwise deletion succeeds with 200.

title: text elements api search by label with filtering and pagination
description: Test GET /api/v1/text-elements/search to verify search by label returns correct filtered and paginated results based on query parameters.
